channel.title: Code sniplet
channel.description: I was wondering if you can make a code sniplet section on www.moparisthebest.com/smf/ . A code sniplet section is where we can post tutorials that are copy and paste.

item.title: Code sniplet
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Copy and paste tutorials are actually how I learned. There’s already a post like that in CM section, and I posted on there too, but no one agreed. But yeah copy and paste tutorials are great for learning, but bad for leeching.

Read full topic

item.title: Code sniplet
item.dc:creator: @moparsc4p3 moparsc4p3
item.description:
@moparsc4p3 wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:3, topic:124866”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=174754.msg1612003#msg1612003 date=1184852627]
What exactly is the point of copy and pasting something from one place to another? Seems a strange idea, if your providing code you should write a tutorial, the only people who need this is those who are stealing code and don’t understand it?

You need to explain better Although I think Aftermath suggested something similar recently.

[Off-Topic] That’s Semaphore’s sig? lol[/Off-topic]
[/quote]
Don’t worry Greeny, he leaches everything ;)[/quote]

STFU yz85racer

Read full topic

item.title: Code sniplet
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

frank_:

code snippet != copy/paste tutorial though

Thats why i think a pastebin would be better instead of a board.

Read full topic

item.title: Code sniplet
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Aftermath asked for something like this in the moparscape vet section, i personally think something like Sppts pastebin would do fine for something like this, as it lays it out good and easy to see.

Example
